infobox.Japanese title:: 米花町グルニエの家  (Beika-chō Gurunie no Ie)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Hiroshi Agasa  Yukiko Kudo  Yusaku Kudo  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Gin  Vodka  Vermouth  Night Baron

infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Kenichi Ogata as Hiroshi Agasa  Hideyuki Tanaka as Yusaku Kudo  Sumi Shimamoto as Yukiko Kudo  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Akira Murayama as Fukase  Masaaki Tsukada as Hisashi Udo  Tamie Kubota as Mrs. Udo  Naoki Imamura as Taxi driver  Daisuke Nendo as Chinese man

sections.Situation: A small three-story house is put up for rent in the neighborhood and the Detective Boys decide to pass by it on the way home from school. Haibara tricks the real estate agent into giving them a tour of the inside and Conan notices that he could see Kogoro's detective agency from the third floor window. The next day, they discover the house has been sold to an old couple and Conan finds them suspicious. He follows the old man to China town and into an antique shop. The old man is talking with an old Chinese man. Conan is discovered and flees from the scene. Later that day, Conan notices that the house has a camera directed towards the Mouri detective agency and deduces the old couples are people using a disguise.

sections.Trivia:
- The taxi was a white taxi with 11-82 license plate. The second cab has a license plate of 2-90.
- There is a reference to Conan Edogawa Kidnapping Case.
- Negishi Moving Company reappears during the post-credit scene.
